Metadata.title: Portfolio Mathieu Langumier
Metadata.description: A portfolio with my resume and examples of professional and personnal projects I have had the pleasure of working on.

UnderConstruction.title: Page under construction
UnderConstruction.welcomeText: Welcome, dear visitor! This page is currently being worked on and should be available soon.
UnderConstruction.githubText: In the meanwhile, you can visit the Github repository if you want more information on what tools are being used for this project and what features might be added in the future.
UnderConstruction.linkedinText: Feel free to send me a message on LinkedIn if you have any question regarding my work or this project.
UnderConstruction.goodbyeText: Thank you for your visit, and I hope to see you again soon!
